General.Name: Xinke Material
General.Description: Anhui Xinke New Materials Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of copper alloy strip products in China. The company's products include brass, iron-copper, bronze, copper-iron alloy, phosphor bronze, zinc white copper, and zinc-nickel-nickel bare strips, and their reflow tinned and hot-dip tinned strips, etc., as well as frame materials, and zinc white copper strips. In addition, the company is also involved in the recycling of waste materials; and non-ferrous metal smelting, rolling, and processing. Its products are used in integrated circuits, consumer electronics, traditional passenger cars and new energy vehicles, LED, photovoltaic power, new generation information technology and 5G, smart terminals, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Kingswood Enterprise Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Anhui Xinke New Materials Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Wuhu, China.

3.Name: Mr. Long  Zhang
3.Title: Director, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
